opis: U našoj ponudi imamo prekrasnu kuću za najam u Poreču. Stambena površina iznosi 180m2 te se sastoji od 4 spavaće sobe, dnevnog boravka, 3 kupaone i 3 wc-a, kuhinje. Kući pripada i okućnica od 800m2, te ima parkinga za 3 auta. U izgradnji je bazen. Mjesečni najam iznosi 3000 eura + režije. Dugoročni najam s kapacitetom za 8 osoba. Poreč je grad u Hrvatskoj smješten na zapadnoj obali poluotoka Istre. Gradu Poreču pripada tri otoka i/li otočića koji su svrstani u kategoriju MPNNo (mali, povremeno nastanjeni i nenastanjeni otoci i otočići). Porečka regija ili Poreština pokriva 142 km², s obalom dugom 37 km, od rijeke Mirne kod Novigrada na sjeveru do Funtane i Vrsara na jugu. Klima je vrlo blaga, bez ljetnih sparina. Za vise informacija geofly.immobilien@gmail.com, 095 829 1188 English: In our offer we have a beautiful house for rent in Poreč. The living area is 180m2 and consists of 4 bedrooms, living room, 3 bathrooms and 3 toilets, kitchen. The house also has a garden of 800m2, and there is parking for 3 cars. A swimming pool is under construction. The monthly rent is 3000 euros + utilities. Long-term rental with capacity for 8 people. Poreč is a city in Croatia located on the west coast of the Istrian peninsula. The city of Poreč has three islands and/or islets that are classified as MPNNo (small, occasionally inhabited and uninhabited islands and islets). The Poreč region or Poreština covers 142 km², with a 37 km long coastline, from the Mirna River near Novigrad in the north to Funtana and Vrsar in the south. The climate is very mild, without summer heat.
